properties.areaDesc: Ventura County Coast; Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
properties.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued January 3 at 9:34PM PST until January 4 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents and breaking waves are expected
due to elevated surf of 4 to 6 feet. Isolated max sets to 7
feet possible through this evening.

* WHERE...Well exposed west-facing beaches of the Ventura County
Coast and Los Angeles County Coast.

* WHEN...Through late tonight.

* IMPACTS...There is an increased risk of ocean drowning. Rip
currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Waves can
wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats
nearshore.
properties.instruction:
Remain out of the water due to hazardous swimming conditions, or
stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly
in such conditions, stay off the rocks.

NWSheadline: BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST SATURDAY
